name: Brandeis University Mock Trials Association
description: The Brandeis University Mock Trial Association (BUMTA) is the official, student-run mock trial organization of Brandeis University in Waltham, MA.

name: Robotics Club
description: A club for those interested in building robots.

name: Education for Students by Students
description: The mission of ESS is to provide the platform FOR students BY students to develop and share your unique ideas through presentation and conversation.

name: Active Minds
description: Through campus-wide events, Brandeis Active Minds aims to remove the stigma that surrounds mental health issues, and create a comfortable environment for an open conversation about mental health issues in our school community.

name: Behind the Scenes
description: The club members work together to provide theater tech and shop support to the shows happening on campus.

name: Boris' Kitchen Sketch Comedy
description: The club members perform student-written sketch comedy, and educate others about writing and performing.

name: Brandeis African Student Organization
description: BASO seeks to culturally empower African students and the student body at large to become socially, politically, and critically aware of African Cultures.

name: Brandeis Ballet Club
description: To further educate Brandeis students in the history and development of ballet, train students in the technical aspects of ballet, and raise awareness of dance as an art.

name: Brandeis Mixed Martial Arts
description: BMMA will instruct on basic and advanced approaches to martial arts, self defense, and combat sports.

name: Brandeis Pole Dance and Fitness
description: Brandeis Pole Dance & Fitness club aims to promote both mental and physical health and fitness through careful instruction of techniques in stretching, plyometrics, isometrics, and Aerial Pole Dance.
